text: jin logon ne inakaar kiya unaka kahana hai ki "hamapar qiyaamat kee ghadee nahin aaegee." kah do, "kyon nahin, mere paroksh gyaata rab kee qasam! vah to tumapar aakar rahegee - usase kanabhar bhee koee cheez na to aakaashon mein ojhal hai aur na dharatee mein, aur na isase chhotee koee cheez aur na badee. kintu vah ek spasht kitaab mein ankit hai.
